Sections.Name: CautiousTravel
Sections.Description: Configuration for the Cautious Travel option. If enabled, it provides time accelerated travel at a speed penalty, but with the benefit of a chance to avoid random encounters based on luck plus Stealth, as well as health monitoring.

Keys.Name: PlayerControlledCautiousTravel
Keys.Description: Enables the travel option "Cautiously" to initiate time accelerated travel, instead of vanilla fast travel

Keys.Name: SpeedPenalty
Keys.Description: Speed penalty for travelling cautiously, as a percentage

Keys.Name: MaxChanceToAvoidEncounter
Keys.Description: Maximum chance to avoid an encounter when travelling cautiously, as a percentage

Keys.Name: HealthMinimumPercentage
Keys.Description: Level of health that will automatically pause the journey when travelling cautiously, as a percentage

Keys.Name: FatigueMinimumValue
Keys.Description: Level of fatigue that will automatically pause the journey when travelling cautiously, absolute value

Sections.Name: StopAtInnsTravel
Sections.Description: Configuration for the Stop At Inns Travel option. If enabled, this effectively disables normal fast traveling completely except when sailing.

Keys.Name: PlayerControlledInnsTravel
Keys.Description: Enables the stop for night travel option "Inns" to initiate time accelerated travel, instead of fast travel

Sections.Name: ShipTravel
Sections.Description: Configuration for the Ship Travel option and the port restrictions applied to it.

Keys.Name: OnlyFromPorts
Keys.Description: Restricts ship travel to be possible only from places with ports

Keys.Name: OnlyToPorts
Keys.Description: Restricts ship travel to be possible only if destination has a port, if from ports setting is enabled

Sections.Name: GeneralOptions
Sections.Description: Configuration for  general travel options to suit each player and system setup.

Keys.Name: PathsTravel
Keys.Description: Enables time accelerated travelling following paths if BasicRoads mod is installed

Keys.Name: AllowWeather
Keys.Description: Allows weather effects during time accelerated travel

Keys.Name: AllowAnnoyingSounds
Keys.Description: Allows annoying sounds during time accelerated travel

Keys.Name: AllowRealGrass
Keys.Description: Allows the Real Grass mod to run during time accelerated travel

Keys.Name: LocationPause
Keys.Description: Auto pause when encountering a game location during real time accelerated travel

Keys.Name: DefaultStartingAcceleration
Keys.Description: The initial time acceleration used after starting the game

Keys.Name: AlwaysUseStartingAcceleration
Keys.Description: Always uses the default starting acceleration when initiating a journey, rather than value from the previous journey

Keys.Name: AccelerationLimit
Keys.Description: The maximum limit allowed for time acceleration
